snippet: Mohammed Kazmi, who worked for an Iranian news agency in New Delhi, was arrested as part of an investigation into the bombing last month of a van carrying the wife of an Israeli diplomat.
abstract: Mohammed Kazmi, an Indian journalist, is arrested as part of an investigation into the bombing in February of a van carrying the wife of an Israeli diplomat, an attack for which Israeli officials have blamed Iran.

byline.original: By JIM YARDLEY and HARI KUMAR

lead_paragraph: Mohammed Kazmi, who worked for an Iranian news agency in New Delhi, was arrested as part of an investigation into the bombing last month of a van carrying the wife of an Israeli diplomat.

headline.seo: Journalist Is Arrested in Bombing Against Israeli in India
headline.main: Journalist in India Is Arrested in Bombing Against Israeli
headline.print_headline: Journalist in India Is Arrested in Bombing Against Israeli in New Delhi
